CRW_Sharp_Rock |guid = e72ca5d6-fa49-45b8-949e-578f695b3659 }} '''Mother Sharp-Rock''' is a female [Xaurip](/xaurip/) and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|From between the bars stares a frail and sickly xaurip. It shrinks when you near, pressing itself into the furthest corner of its cage, trembling. Around its neck are the remnants of a bedraggled feather crest. Paint is smeared across its face, but the paint is old, flaking. It hasn't been reapplied in some time. The xaurip's regalia suggests they may have been an important figure in the tribe, but its condition makes clear that those days are long past.}} Sharp-Rock was deposed by [Warchief Rauki](/warchiefRauki/) and locked up to die, but the Watcher can save her and add the poor xaurip to their crew. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |other = With Insight 3, Survival 4, and History 2 you can determine her past and role in xaurip society. |crew = {{crewrank|1|deckhand}}
{{crewrank|1|cook}} * Personality: Religious, Wilder * Must be saved in the cavern }} ## Trivia * If recruited, Mother Sharp-Rock does not take a daily wage as part of the crew (but will still consume the ships food and drink resources). ## Gallery Portrait_Mother_Sharp_Rock_convo.png | Mother Sharp-Rock's conversation portrait. Portrait_Mother_Sharp_Rock_sm.png | Mother Sharp-Rock's crew member portrait. {{Crew navbar PoE2}} [Category:Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members](/categoryPillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/)
